plot: Nolan & Amanda plan escape after they're captured while excavating a buried weapons cache. Meanwhile Berlin sees an opportunity for revenge against Irisa while investigating a Votanis Collective bombing in the heart of Defiance. Stahma's clandestine relationship with T'evgin, the mysterious Omec leader, takes a turn.

After their munitions are destroyed, Nolan thinks he may have a lead on an old, hidden arms cash. They arrive at Station Arrowhead where the former Mayor of Defiance, Niles Pottinger, is in residence. He's still infatuated with Amanda but she soon realizes he was the masked man who attacked and raped her. Getting out of the station is not going to be easy however. Stahma and Datak meanwhile follow through on orders from General Rahm Tak and blow up the Sr. Louis arch. Stahma proceeds with her plan to assassinate T'evgin.—garykmcd
